City Council Contact Information

Physical Address Town Hall 15600 Addison Road Addison, TX 75001 View on Google Maps

Mailing Address P.O. Box 9010 Addison, TX 75001

Monday - Friday 8am - 5pm

Bruce Arfsten

Mayor

  • Telephone 972-450-7000
  • Email barfsten@addisontx.gov

Marlin Willesen

Mayor Pro Tempore

  • Telephone 972-233-4222
  • Email mwillesen@addisontx.gov

  • Telephone 972-450-7000
